description technical detail:
NEC LCD X461S 46 Inch Large Screen Monitor
NEC LCD X461S Display 46 Inch Screen is super slim, professional grade with high quality presentation like a classic public display.
Product Overview
The NEC LCD X461S 46 Inch TV Display is a new rank of public monitor that is fabricate to the superior standards and loaded with high-tech innovation.Capable with a certified grade panel, these models distribute spotless full HD image excellence while operating nonstop. This is the first model with wide regularity in option slots, make simpler installation, utilize and preservation of digital signage. NEC LDC X461S TV 46 Inch Display also first in NEC LCD family to support Intel's OPS (Open Pluggable Specification) and meet tough Energy efficiency strategies set by the Environmental Protection Agency and Department of Energy serving you save money and lessen greenhouse gas emissions. This high quality Super Slim full high definition display provide LED backlighting technology to offer quality imagery and constant picture. This is highly appointed professional grade display for commercial uses.
Key Features
Premium Grade High Quality LCD Panel (46 Inch)
OPS (Open Pluggable Specification)
Built-in Expansion Slot for Integration of NEC and Third Party Components
LED Backlighting Technology
Compact Packaging helps reduce waste and shipping cost
TileMatrix Capability
Carbon Footprint Meter Capability (Environment Friendly)
Improved Design with Super Slim Display
NaViSet Administrator2 For Better Management
Resolution (native) 1920x1080
